aa has always had the 7kg rule....but it is enforced differently at different stations....some strict, some lax....usually depending on stations...if too many people bring oversize overweight bags in they will be strict as there is not enough space on board...on and off, they will enforce strictly tightly as a policy...the same rule apples to the other local airlines, mas, malindo etc...just that they don't enforce strictly...because people don't carry too much on board as they have 30kg check in allowance free...
international stations where rules are obediently followed will enforce strictly...oz being one of them....
